headline: Align Technology Showcases Digital Dentistry Innovations at Greater New York Dental Meeting 2025
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., December 03, 2025--Align Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ: ALGN), a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software, today shared highlights from its participation at the Greater New York Dental Meeting (GNYDM) 2025, one of the largest annual dental congresses in the United States.
